name: Hampton Inn Slidell

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I always love a Hampton Inn stay and this Hampton Inn did not disappoint.
reviews.title: Good Place to Stay
Cofortable Stay
reviews.text: It had the new bedding but not the new upgraded rooms yet that Hampton is the process of renovating. However, the room was clean, nicely appointed and no complaints.

reviews.title: Comfortable
reviews.text: The front desk was very attentive and all our needs were met. I would recommend this property as a good stop for the night on your journey.
As in prior reviews this motel's rooms were renovated. The beds appear new and are very comfortable, each room has a flat screen TV, and the bathroom is very nicely appointed with a modern vanity.
reviews.title: Nicely appointed rooms, average breakfast, subpar wireless, pricey for Slidell

reviews.text: On the down side, the breakfast's hot items could use some improvement, the wireless internet is not all that "high speed" and the motel pricing is high compared to the local competition.
reviews.title: Pleasant Stay

reviews.text: The staff I interacted with for the most part were friendly although one younger guy behaved like I was bothering him every time I asked him a question. He needs to polish his people skills.
reviews.title: Tired travelers encounter tired hotel

likes.disliked: — Cold, uninviting lighting and tired rooms.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Clean, comfortable hotel with helpful, friendly staff.
reviews.title: stayed against my better judgement ~bad idea

description: Future reservations are not being accepted at this time due to impact from Hurricane Katrina.
